pkgmetadata.longdescription: Print Tabular Data to Graphics Device // Provides a generalized method for printing tabular data within the R environment in order to make the process of presenting high quality tabular output seamless for the user. Output is directed to the R graphics device so that tables can be exported to any file format supported by the graphics device. Utilizes a formula interface to specify the contents of tables often found in manuscripts or business reports. In addition, formula interface provides inline formatting of the numeric cells of a table and renaming column labels.
